# Harmonic Scale in F# (Mode: Harmonic Minor, Shape: D)

The Harmonic scale in F# is a seven-note scale consisting of the following notes in the D shape:
- F# (Root)
- G#
- A
- B
- C#
- D
- E#

## Notes and Intervals Breakdown
- F# to G#: Major 2nd
- G# to A: minor 2nd
- A to B: Major 2nd
- B to C#: Major 2nd
- C# to D: minor 2nd
- D to E#: Major 2nd
- E# to F#: minor 2nd

## Genre and Musical Flavor
The Harmonic scale in F# (Mode: Harmonic Minor, Shape: D) is commonly found in genres that require a more exotic or mysterious sound. It offers a distinct flavor due to its semitones and augmented 2nd intervals that create tension and resolve in a unique way.
